ë…¹ìŒ-ëŒ€ë³¸:
As she emerges from the sea onto the shore, she realizes that
her voice is gone, but she still recognizes its immeasurable beauty
and preciousness. She expresses it in the following way:
"Voice is an ineffable beauty. It is the purest and most precious gift.
Though I have lost this cherished gift, I will embark on a journey
to find true love through other means. Even without my voice,
the emotions and passions within me will not easily fade away.
Love transcends language. In this quest to reclaim my precious voice,
I will discover my true self and learn the ways of love and freedom."
